moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Leaf Tornado
moves.description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.
